pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadanti pariyāyena. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato cūḷapanthakassa pariyāyo hoti bhikkhuniyo ovadituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.3: Bhikkhuniyo evamāhaṃsu—“na dāni ajja ovādo iddho bhavissati, taññeva dāni udānaṃ ayyo cūḷapanthako punappunaṃ bhaṇissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.4: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo yenāyasmā cūḷapanthako tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmā cūḷapanthako etadavoca—“samaggāttha, bhaginiyo”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.9: “Eso, bhaginiyo, ovādo”ti niyyādetvā imaṃ udānaṃ punappunaṃ abhāsi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.14: Bhikkhuniyo evamāhaṃsu—“nanu avocumhā—na dāni ajja ovādo iddho bhavissati, taññeva dāni udānaṃ ayyo cūḷapanthako punappunaṃ bhaṇissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.15: Assosi kho āyasmā cūḷapanthako tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.16: Atha kho āyasmā cūḷapanthako vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti dhūmāyatipi pajjalatipi antaradhāyatipi, tañceva udānaṃ bhaṇati aññañca bahuṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.19: Na vata no ito pubbe ovādo evaṃ iddho bhūtapubbo yathā ayyassa cūḷapanthakassā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.20: Atha kho āyasmā cūḷapanthako tā bhikkhuniyo yāva samandhakārā ovaditvā uyyojesi—“gacchatha, bhaginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.21: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo nagaradvāre thakite bahinagare vasitvā kālasseva nagaraṃ pavisanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.22: Manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—“abrahmacāriniyo imā bhikkhuniyo;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.23: ārāme bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasitvā idāni nagaraṃ pavisantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.24: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.25: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.26: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā cūḷapanthako atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.27: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, cūḷapanthaka, atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.30: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, cūḷapanthaka, atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.32: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.33: “Sammatopi ce bhikkhu atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:2.1.8: aṭṭhahi vā garudhammehi aññena vā dhammena ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
